1.5.name: wordpress/spammers-suck
1.5.description:
No captchas, no questions, no counting animals, no puzzles — simple.

Spam is an epidemic

  • From 2009 to 2012, spam has increased by 600%.
  • Spam accounts for 90% of all message submissions.
  • An average of 60 million spam messages are sent daily.

Sources: [1] Akismet

How This Stops Your Blogs's Attackers

It's humanly impossible to fill out a standard WordPress registration or comment form in less than a certain number of seconds, and this mod hammers those that do, preventing the attack.

When a spammer is caught, you have the option to receive a report by email so you can see the spam hammer in action.

Read Over 20 Testimonials Here: http://vbresults.com/blog/spam-hammer-testimonials/#testimonials-1-series

<
